law.catch_line: Each corporation shall maintain a stock ledger which contains:...

text.section:
Each corporation shall maintain a stock ledger which contains:
The name and address of each stockholder; and
The number of shares of stock of each class which the stockholder holds.
The stock ledger may be in written form or in any other form which can be converted within a reasonable time into written form for visual inspection.
The original or a duplicate of the stock ledger shall be kept at the principal office of the corporation or at any other office or agency specified in the bylaws.
